recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cheese Ball
recipes.directions: In a medium bowl, beat together cream cheese and butter until smooth. Mix in confectioners' sugar, brown sugar and vanilla. Stir in chocolate chips. Cover, and chill in the refrigerator for 2 hours. Roll the cheese ball in finely chopped pecans before serving.

recipes.title: Chef John's Scones
ingredients: 5 tablespoons cold unsalted butter, cut into pieces
recipes.directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Whisk flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt together in a mixing bowl. Cut in butter with a knife or pastry blender until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Bake in the preheated oven until scones have risen and turned golden brown, about 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Caprese Appetizer
recipes.directions: Toss tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, olive oil, basil, salt, and pepper together in a bowl until well coated. Skewer one tomato and one piece of mozzarella cheese on each toothpick.
